api_list.api_description: Retrieve trace information from Cloudflare including IP Address, Timestamp, User Agent, Country Code, and more.

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: The endpoint URL to query Cloudflare trace information.

api_list.api_description: Get a list of recent URLs added to URLhaus.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned (max 1000).

query: Can you provide the latest trace information of my network and also list some recent potentially malicious URLs?
